title: ‘Roar Of The Lion’ Teaser: After Biopic, MS Dhoni To Share His ‘Untold Story’ In A Web Series
text:
‘Roar Of The Lion’ Teaser: After Biopic, MS Dhoni To Share His ‘Untold Story’ In A Web Series
‘Roar Of The Lion’ Teaser: After Biopic, MS Dhoni To Share His ‘Untold Story’ In A Web Series
If the biopic of Dhoni left you wanting for more, here is a good news. After Sachin Tendulkar’s ‘Sachin: A Billion Dreams’, M.S Dhoni's life story is now being adapted in a documentary-drama for a web-series.
Agencies
In the teaser of the video, Dhoni says:
Agencies
“You all are aware about my journey from a Ranchi ticket collector to the World Cup (plot of ‘MS Dhoni: The Untold Story’) Dhoni, Mahi, MSD, Captain Cool, Thala, every name of mine, every story of mine, you all know. But there is one story that you haven’t heard. This is the story of stubbornnes."
Watch the video right here:

The episodes of ‘Roar of the Lion’, a Hotstar Special, will be available for watching from 20th March. Without further ado, watch the teaser here!
